body: Let's leave this open until we get the `has_many`s finished
This should be possible to make now that sponsor model is created 👍
Assuming merge request is accepted and closing
Should be accessible by sponsors too so that they can view and mark items complete, no?
Again, shouldn't this be viewable by the sponsor in their portal?
They'll get a list that is scoped to them (they only see their own tasks and statuses)
I don't think so. The pledge information is added by admins. This is purely internal tracking

Okay .. I guess I was assuming we were showing that information back to the sponsors to make sure it was recorded correctly or if they were going to choose to update it i.e. adding hardware or something. I suppose either works.
I feel like sponsors could be malicious about that and change their levels, etc.
Check update method - might have done that incorrectly.
That's one more job than you :O
I know that you are just a superior programmer, @emilyengle. 🙇
@kylekthompson @emilyengle just saw that... regardless the problem seems to be a result of jQuery and turbolinks conflicts - didn't figure out resolution though
Just finished the controller and views for this (we'll have to add buttons in various places though)
